## Color3 class

Class used to hold a RBG color

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Color3 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(r, g, b)](./decentraland-ecs.color3.(constructor).md) |  | Creates a new Color3 object from red, green, blue values, all between 0 and 1 |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [b](./decentraland-ecs.color3.b.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the blue component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  [g](./decentraland-ecs.color3.g.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the green component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  [r](./decentraland-ecs.color3.r.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the red component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
